notes:
## 🚨 Breaking Changes

- **Enhanced version validation system** with stricter compliance checking (may require developer review)
- **Intelligent code analysis engine** now analyzes actual code changes for accurate semantic versioning
- **Historical version corrections** applied to maintain proper version sequence

## ✨ New Features

- **Intelligent Code Analysis Engine** - Advanced semantic versioning classification using code diff analysis
- **Historical Version Reversion System** - Corrected all previous versions based on actual code changes
- **Enhanced Release Notes** - More detailed, user-friendly descriptions of changes
- **Version Synchronization** - Perfect alignment between database, git tags, GitHub, and UI

## 🔧 Improvements

- **Database Operations** - Enhanced for better version tracking and data integrity
- **Version Display** - Improved system to show accurate release information throughout UI
- **Commit System** - Enhanced reliability and user experience with better conflict resolution
- **Documentation** - Comprehensive feature tracking and version history details

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

- **Navigation Bar** - Fixed to display current version correctly
- **Release Notes Page** - Enhanced to display corrected version history
- **Commit Staging** - Resolved conflicts in commit-and-push system

---

**📝 Version Correction Notice:**
This release was originally versioned as 1.1.0 but has been corrected to 2.0.0 based on intelligent code analysis.

**Reason:** Should be MAJOR not MINOR: 2 breaking changes

**Original Release Notes:**
# 🎉 Version 1.1.0

## ✨ Feature Update

New features and enhancements to make Issues Tracker even better.

### ✨ New Features

- **Automatic Timezone Detection**: Your local timezone is now automatically detected and all timestamps are displayed in your time zone
- **Enhanced Time Display**: Smart relative time formatting ("2h ago", "3d ago") with full timestamp tooltips
- **Improved WebEx Notifications**: All WebEx notifications now use consistent timezone formatting
- **Enhanced Development Protocols**: Strengthened development safety protocols with industry best practices

### 🔧 System Improvements

- **Cross-Platform Compatibility**: Timezone system works seamlessly in both development and AWS App Runner production
- **Server-Side Optimization**: Improved server-side timezone handling for better performance
- **Client Persistence**: Timezone preferences are now cached for consistent experience across sessions

### 🐛 Bug Fixes

- **Notification System**: Resolved JSON parsing errors in WebEx notification system
- **Timestamp Display**: Fixed inconsistent timestamp formatting across different components

---

**📅 Released:** August 26, 2025
**📦 Version:** 1.1.0

*Thank you for using Issues Tracker! 🙏*

notes:
## 🎉 Initial Release - Netsync Issues Tracker v1.0.0

Welcome to the comprehensive issue tracking system designed for modern teams!

## ✨ Core Features

- **Complete Issue Management**: Create, track, and resolve bug reports, feature requests, and general questions
- **Smart Duplicate Detection**: AI-powered duplicate prevention using TF-IDF similarity matching
- **Real-time Collaboration**: Live updates, comments, and notifications via Server-Sent Events
- **WebEx Integration**: Seamless notifications and adaptive cards for team communication
- **Advanced Search & Filtering**: Powerful tools to find and organize issues efficiently

## 🔄 Workflow Management

- **Status Tracking**: Open → In Progress → Pending Testing → Backlog → Rejected → Closed
- **Assignment System**: Admin-controlled issue assignment with requirement enforcement
- **Resolution Comments**: Mandatory detailed resolution notes for closed issues
- **Status History**: Complete audit trail of all changes with timestamps

## 👥 User Experience

- **Upvoting System**: Community-driven issue prioritization
- **Following System**: Stay updated on issues you care about
- **File Attachments**: Support for images, documents, and various file types
- **Emoji Support**: Express yourself with emoji picker in comments
- **Responsive Design**: Optimized for desktop and mobile devices

## 🔒 Security & Authentication

- **SAML SSO Integration**: Enterprise-grade single sign-on
- **Role-based Access**: Admin and user permissions with proper controls
- **Secure File Storage**: AWS S3 integration with access controls
- **Session Management**: Secure authentication with automatic logout

## 🤖 Automation & Intelligence

- **Automated Versioning**: Semantic versioning with feature change detection
- **Release Notes Generation**: Automatic user-friendly release documentation
- **Weekly Analytics**: Comprehensive reporting sent to administrators
- **Post-deployment Processing**: Automatic feature tracking and version management

## 📊 Admin Dashboard

- **System Statistics**: Real-time metrics and issue counts
- **User Management**: Create, edit, and manage user accounts
- **Assigned Issues View**: Dedicated workspace for admin-assigned tasks
- **Settings Management**: Configure WebEx integration and system preferences

This release establishes the foundation for efficient issue tracking and team collaboration.
helpContent:
## Getting Started

Welcome to the Netsync Issues Tracker! This comprehensive guide will help you make the most of all available features.

## Issue Management

### Creating Issues
Submit bug reports, feature requests, or general questions through our intuitive form interface. Each issue is automatically assigned a unique number for easy reference.

### Issue Types
- **Bug Report**: Report software defects or unexpected behavior
- **Feature Request**: Suggest new functionality or improvements  
- **General Question**: Ask questions or seek clarification

### Smart Duplicate Detection
Our AI-powered system uses advanced TF-IDF similarity matching to prevent duplicate submissions by showing you similar existing issues before you submit.

### Issue Editing
Edit your own issues after submission to add more details or clarify information.

## Collaboration Features

### Following Issues
Stay updated on issues that matter to you:
- Click the "Follow" button on any issue
- Automatically follow issues you create or comment on
- Receive WebEx notifications when followed issues are updated
- Unfollow at any time to stop receiving notifications

### Comments & Discussions
- Add comments to provide additional information
- Attach files and images to your comments (up to 5MB each)
- Use the emoji picker to express reactions
- Paste images directly from your clipboard
- Admin comments are highlighted for visibility
- Comments are locked when issues are closed

### Upvoting System
Show support for issues by upvoting them:
- One upvote per user per issue
- Higher upvoted issues get more visibility
- Upvote counts update in real-time
- Cannot upvote your own issues

## Real-time Features

### Live Updates
- See new comments and status changes instantly via Server-Sent Events
- Browser tab notifications when you're away
- Audio alerts for new activity
- Auto-scroll to new content
- Real-time upvote count updates

### WebEx Integration
- Automatic notifications sent to WebEx rooms
- Rich adaptive cards with issue details and actions
- Direct messages for status updates and comments
- Weekly analytics reports sent to administrators
- Follower notifications for issue closures

## Search & Organization

### Advanced Search
- Search across titles, descriptions, and creators
- Filter by issue type (Bug Report, Feature Request, General Question)
- Filter by status (Open, In Progress, Pending Testing, Backlog, Rejected, Closed)
- Filter by assignment status
- Sort by creation date or upvote count
- Clear all filters with one click

### View Options
- **Table View**: Compact list with sortable columns
- **Card View**: Visual cards with more details
- Pagination for easy browsing of large issue lists
- "My Issues" filter to see only issues you created

## Status Management

### Issue Lifecycle
- **Open**: New issues awaiting review
- **In Progress**: Issues being actively worked on  
- **Pending Testing**: Issues awaiting verification
- **Backlog**: Issues scheduled for future work
- **Rejected**: Issues that won't be addressed
- **Closed**: Completed issues with resolution

### Assignment Requirements
- Issues must be assigned to an admin before status changes
- Only admins can change issue status
- Mandatory resolution comments when closing issues
- Complete status history with audit trail

## File Management

### Attachments
- Upload files up to 5MB each
- Support for images, documents, and various file types
- Secure AWS S3 cloud storage with access controls
- Download links provided in notifications
- File previews where supported
- Attachment support in both issues and comments

## Admin Features

### Admin Dashboard
- Comprehensive system statistics and metrics
- Real-time issue counts by status and type
- User management interface
- Assigned issues workspace with full table functionality

### Issue Assignment
- Assign issues to team members
- Track workload distribution across admins
- View all issues assigned to you in dedicated dashboard
- Search, filter, and paginate assigned issues

### User Management
- Create and manage user accounts
- Assign admin or user roles
- Support for SAML SSO and local authentication
- Password reset functionality for local accounts
- User creation from multiple sources (SAML, manual, WebEx sync)

### System Administration
- Issue renumbering and resequencing tools
- WebEx integration settings and configuration
- Manual release notes creation
- Settings management for app-wide configuration
- Automated versioning with feature change detection

## Notifications

### WebEx Notifications
- New issue alerts with adaptive cards
- Status change notifications with before/after states
- Comment notifications for issue followers
- Weekly analytics summaries with assigned issue counts
- Automatic user synchronization from WebEx rooms

### Real-time Browser Notifications
- Instant updates via Server-Sent Events
- Browser tab title alerts when away
- Audio notifications for new activity
- Visual indicators for new content

## Security & Authentication

### Authentication Methods
- **SAML SSO**: Enterprise-grade single sign-on integration
- **Local Authentication**: Username/password for standalone use
- Secure session management with automatic logout
- Role-based access control (Admin vs User permissions)

### Data Protection
- Secure file storage with AWS S3 integration
- Access controls and permission enforcement
- Complete audit trails for all changes
- Status change logging with timestamps
- Data privacy compliance measures

## Automated Features

### Versioning System
- Semantic versioning with automated release notes
- Feature change detection and documentation
- Post-deployment processing for version management
- Automatic UI updates with new version numbers
- Release notes generation from feature changes

### Analytics & Reporting
- Weekly analytics reports sent to administrators
- System usage statistics and metrics
- Issue trend analysis and reporting
- Performance monitoring and health checks

## Advanced Features

### Following System
- Automatic following for issue creators and commenters
- Explicit follow/unfollow functionality
- Smart notification delivery to followers only
- Follow status persistence across sessions

### Duplicate Detection
- TF-IDF + Cosine Similarity algorithm for accurate detection
- 30% similarity threshold for duplicate identification
- Preprocessing with stop word removal
- Vector-based similarity calculations

### Real-time Communication
- Server-Sent Events for instant updates
- WebSocket-like functionality without WebSocket complexity
- Automatic reconnection and error handling
- Multi-channel event distribution

## Tips for Success

1. **Be Descriptive**: Provide clear titles and detailed descriptions
2. **Use Attachments**: Include screenshots or files when helpful
3. **Follow Up**: Stay engaged with comments and updates
4. **Search First**: Check for existing issues before creating new ones
5. **Use Upvotes**: Show support for issues you care about
6. **Follow Issues**: Stay informed about issues that affect you
7. **Provide Context**: Include problem links for bug reports
8. **Use Appropriate Types**: Choose the right issue type for better organization

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues
- **Can't see updates**: Check if JavaScript is enabled and refresh the page
- **File upload fails**: Ensure file is under 5MB and try again
- **Not receiving notifications**: Check your WebEx settings and follow status
- **Search not working**: Try clearing filters and search terms
- **Can't change status**: Ensure issue is assigned to an admin first

### Getting Help
1. Check this help documentation first
2. Search existing issues for similar problems
3. Create a new issue with detailed information
4. Contact your system administrator
5. Check the release notes for recent changes

For technical support, create a bug report with:
- Detailed description of the problem
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Screenshots or attachments if helpful
- Browser and system information

# 🎉 Version 1.5.0

## ✨ Feature Update

New features and enhancements to make Issues Tracker even better.

### ✨ New Features

- **Industry-Standard Semantic Versioning Compliance**: Full adherence to SemVer 2.0.0 standards with comprehensive validation
- **Enhanced Database Operations with SemVer Compliance Validation**: Improved database operations with semantic versioning validation
- **Interactive Commit Approval System**: Enhanced navigation and commit system with user approval workflow

- **Interactive Preview System**: Comprehensive commit preview with detailed release notes generation
- **GitHub Version Synchronization**: Enhanced alignment between local and remote version tracking
- **Breaking Change Prevention**: Advanced validation to prevent incorrect major version increments

---

**📅 Released:** August 26, 2025
**📦 Version:** 1.5.0

*Thank you for using Issues Tracker! 🙏*

# 🎉 Version 4.0.0

## 🚀 Major Update

This is a significant update with new features and improvements that enhance your experience with Issues Tracker.

### ✨ New Features

- **Enhanced Commit System** - Completely redesigned commit-push system with interactive approval and detailed preview
- **Comprehensive Version Synchronization** - Added automated version sync across GitHub, database, and UI systems
- **Detailed Release Notes Generation** - Implemented intelligent release notes with user-friendly descriptions
- **Advanced Testing Infrastructure** - Added comprehensive test suite for release system validation
- **Semantic Versioning Compliance** - Enhanced version classification with industry-standard SemVer 2.0.0 compliance
- **Breaking Change Prevention Protocol** - Integrated mandatory safety checks before any code modifications

### 🐛 Bug Fixes

- **Fixed Commit Classification** - Resolved maintenance changes to properly trigger patch releases instead of being ignored
- **Enhanced Version Detection** - Improved synchronization between package.json, GitHub tags, and database versions
- **Release Plugin Processing** - Fixed commit body extraction for detailed release notes generation
- **Database Release Management** - Corrected release entry creation and version tracking

### 🔧 Improvements

- **Interactive User Experience** - Added approval system with detailed commit previews before execution
- **System Reliability** - Enhanced error handling and recovery in commit operations
- **Documentation Quality** - Improved release notes with context-aware, user-friendly descriptions
- **Development Workflow** - Streamlined version management with automated synchronization tools

---

**📅 Released:** August 26, 2025
**📦 Version:** 4.0.0

*Thank you for using Issues Tracker! 🙏*

This release was originally versioned as 1.3.0 but has been corrected to 2.2.0 based on intelligent code analysis.

**Reason:** Should be MINOR not MINOR: 1 new features

**Original Release Notes:**
# 🎉 Version 1.3.0

## ✨ Feature Update

New features and enhancements to make Issues Tracker even better.

### ✨ New Features

- **Comprehensive Semantic Versioning**: Enhanced automated version classification system with 50+ detection patterns
- **Breaking Change Detection**: Advanced pattern matching for API changes, authentication updates, and schema modifications
- **Feature Classification**: Intelligent detection of new functionality, UI enhancements, and system integrations
- **Bug Fix Recognition**: Comprehensive patterns for error handling, validation fixes, and security patches
- **Maintenance Detection**: Smart classification of documentation, code style, and build system changes

### 🔧 System Improvements

- **Enhanced Pattern Matching**: 20+ patterns for breaking changes, 25+ for features, 30+ for bug fixes
- **Accurate Version Bumping**: Prevents incorrect major version increments for minor changes
- **Improved Release Notes**: Better humanization of technical commit messages for user-friendly descriptions
- **Version History Correction**: Cleaned up incorrect version history and aligned all system references
- **GitHub Integration**: Proper tag management and semantic-release compatibility

### 🐛 Bug Fixes

- **Version Classification**: Fixed incorrect major version detection for enhancement commits
- **Release Notes Generation**: Resolved empty release notes by improving commit message processing
- **Tag Management**: Corrected GitHub tag references and removed conflicting version entries
- **Database Consistency**: Aligned release notes database with corrected semantic versioning

---

**📅 Released:** August 26, 2025
**📦 Version:** 1.3.0

*Thank you for using Issues Tracker! 🙏*
